English.Text: They thought they had been quiet as church mice, but rounding the corner at the back of the warehouse, they have a nasty shock. Upon the balcony above, where you might have thought to gain entry to the warehouse, stands a single Pyrphorian clad in heavy garb, in his hands a long brass pipe from the aperture of which erupts a searing cone of fire. Your people spread and dive for the sea, and the Pyrphorians torch your ship. Only one of your crew return home.
